capabilities.name: Communicate Effectively
capabilities.description: The role requires well-developed written and verbal communication skills to engage with a wide range of audiences.

capabilities.name: Work Collaboratively
capabilities.description: Effective collaboration skills are essential for drawing in expertise and supporting colleagues and other teams to achieve their goals.

capabilities.name: Plan and Prioritise
capabilities.description: Excellent time management is crucial for meeting deadlines and ensuring smooth operation of executive schedules and project deliverables.

capabilities.name: Manage Self
capabilities.description: Ability to remain calm and focused under pressure and competing priorities indicates strong self-management.

capabilities.name: Deliver Results
capabilities.description: The role involves contributing to the continual improvement of the team's work and the organisational maturity, indicating a focus on delivering quality outcomes.

capabilities.name: Project Management
capabilities.description: Undertaking a range of project support activities requires a basic understanding of project management principles.

skills.name: Diary and Records Management
skills.description: Managing executive schedules and handling governance documents.

skills.name: Event Coordination
skills.description: Assisting with travel arrangements and managing logistics for branch events.

skills.name: Stakeholder Liaison
skills.description: Acting as a liaison between the executive and stakeholders, requiring effective communication and relationship management.

skills.name: Report Preparation
skills.description: Preparing reports and briefing documents for executive meetings.

generalRole.title: Assistant Project Officer
generalRole.description: This role involves a blend of project support, administrative tasks, and stakeholder engagement to facilitate the delivery of strategic projects within a government context. It requires a mix of communication, collaboration, planning, and project management skills.
